description:
When installing the Python dependencies in the following step, MySQL support for Python is installed, but not PostgreSQL:

http://docs.openstack.org/diablo/openstack-compute/admin/content/installing-the-cloud-controller.html

Options for using both databases are documented in the following steps.
title: installing python postgresql module

comments.content:
When installing the Python dependencies in the following step, MySQL support for Python is installed, but not PostgreSQL:

Options for using both databases are documented in the following steps.
